name: Sweet Tooth Scribbler
description:
Let your scribbler have doughnuts and sacrifice its health for mood, or let it have broccoli and sacrifice its mood for health?

Either way, sacrifices must be made if your scribbler is going to scribble up and publish awesome classics about your legendary deeds to increase your reputation in the material world, since it ever only thinks positively of you if it is happy.

You don't have to feed your scribbler when the stomach bar is full. In fact you can't, but when you do feed, it'll either lose health or mood.

Note: There's a problem with the embedded version that sometimes collision around the mouth isn't detected and you can't feed anything to the scribbler at all despite not having a full stomach. If that happens, please either refresh the page or download and play a desktop version instead. Sorry!

FIXED: Noted bug: Game will freeze after playing it for a while. I will fix it as soon as I can.
